pkgmetadata.longdescription: ipt-netflow is very fast and effective Netflow exporting module for Linux kernel. Designed for Linux router with heavy network load. This is netfilter/iptables module adding support for NETFLOW target. It's not using conntrack for performance reasons. Supporting NetFlow protocols versions 5, 9, and IPFIX.
